title: What are the names of the machines developed by Charles Babbage? - Quora

response.answer_text: The opthamoscope and the ‘cow-catcher’? You probably mean the Difference Engine (special purpose automatic calculator) and Analytical Engine (general purpose computer). there’s a series of videos on youtube explaining clearly how the Difference Engine works  I’m afraid you may have to wait a few decades (at least) for the Analytical Engine (these guys are trying to get it built Building Charles Babbage's Analytical Engine) this is a video on the analytical engine  Pilot (locomotive) - Wikipedia Ophthalmoscopy - Wikipedia

Babbage, the father of computing, didn’t complete his first creation - the difference engine. The competed parts are in kept safely the British Museum. He also designed but didn’t build a printer. This was built from his designs in 2000. He went on to work and complete the Analytical Engine - a big difference was the use of punch cards as an early form of programming.
